ygData.subject: Some ponderings about the fishing pole.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Folks, After seeing all the different combinations that we have tried to no avail, I m beginning to think there might be a component somewhere that we
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Folks,

After seeing all the different combinations that we have tried to no avail, I'm beginning to think there might be a component somewhere that we are not using. Looking on the 'Database' (http://www.lockjaw.hamptoncity.com/recipe.html) I see that not many combinations have been tried with the cork, sprocket, or cloth twine. Although they dont seem to be the most likely candidates, I could see them as a possibility.

With all the misses, I just cant help thinking we have missed something.

I am also beginning to think that the earlier rumors of the fishing pole being makable are bull shit. If someone is making the poles and the eye glasses, I would have thought we would have heard about more people having them. We have not heard a peep from anyone since. Perhaps as Luke said, the pole was given as part of a GM quest, and was not actually tinkered.

I think it says something about the sad state of tinkering when our 'holy grail' is a damn fishing pole =|

Cheers,

FizzWizz of tunare
